title: Root x Shaw (Shoot): Season 2 Scenes Person of Interest
author: lejunkdrawer
comment:
"so adorable how Jhon follows you around like that, I wish I had a pet"

- Root (the sassy adorable psycho)
I’ve loved Amy Acker since Angel. Loved Sarah Shahi since Life. The two of them together? Mwah!
the moment Shaw shot Root in the shoulder, Root already knew they are gonna cross their tacos

I don't know how but they managed to take the humor and anger from this scene and make it sweet three seasons later

R: "Remember how we first met?"
T he episode in which we are introduced  to SHAW. What a GREAT FIND! Sarah Shahi to do shaw!!
